comments: a(n) = n for squarefree n; otherwise, a(n) > n. - _Ivan Neretin_, May 13 2015
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p(p+1)^(e-1). - _David W. Wilson_, Sep 01 2001
mathematica: Table[{pp, aa} = Transpose[FactorInteger[n]]; Times @@ (pp*(pp + 1)^(aa - 1)), {n, 70}]  (* _Ivan Neretin_, May 13 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, p= f[i, 1]; f[i, 1] = p*(p+1)^(f[i,2]-1); f[i, 2] = 1); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 26 2015
author: _Marc LeBrun_
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, Aug 29 2001
